TextStringDefinition.TextString: Warning! Changing sex settings with running sex interactions can cause issues!\n\nEnd running sex interaction first to avoid possible problems.
Change sex settings.\n\nThese settings affect only sex related functions like gender role recognition, positions progression, autonomy, outfit or pregnancy).
This option requires restarting the game to take full effect!\n\nSave and restart for this setting to work.
Check to enable Sims Sex Autonomy.
Choose an intensity preset for autonomy.\n(this alters the Autonomy Awareness settings, Autonomy Triggers settings, and Autonomy Specifics settings)
Select for less frequent sex, higher Sims and Location precision, slower cooldowns.
Select for default settings for Sex Autonomy.
Select for more frequent sex, higher chances, quicker cooldowns.
Select for very frequent sex, very high chances, relationships don't matter, almost no cooldowns.
Choose which types of autonomy are allowed to run.
Check to allow Sims to perform random sex interactions with other Sims.
Check to allow Sims to perform random masturbation interactions.
Check to allow Sims to try to join existing sex interactions.
Check to allow Sims to perform random sex interactions when travelling to locations. Active household Sims and Sims in travel groups are not included.
Check to allow Sims to initiate sex from romantic conversations.
Check to allow Sims to perform masturbation interactions while watching sex.\n\n(requires Amra72 and ooOLaLa World animations)
Check to allow Sims to perform sex interactions when at a sex club gathering.
Choose which elements are considered when triggering autonomy.
Check to allow Player Sims to participate in Sex Autonomy.
Check to allow Player Sims to join to existing sex interactions.
Check for Sims to stay faithful to their partner and not have sex with others.\n\nThe 'Polyamorous' and 'Noncommittal' traits on Sims ignore this setting.
Check for NPC Sims to avoid sex if they have a high chance of getting pregnant.\n(only works with Menstrual Cycle Pregnancy Mode enabled)
Check for Sims to avoid attempting sex when children are on the lot.\nUncheck for Sims to attempt sex when children are on the lot.
Check for Sims to assess risk of having sex by their age, number of Sims around, number of children around, and family relations.
Edit specific parts of autonomy and mess up everything.
Set a multiplier value of the random sex timer. Higher values make autonomy slower, lower values make autonomy faster.\n(Default: 1.0, Minimum: 0.01)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random solo sex occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.70, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random sex occurring when travelling to a location. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.80, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a maximum number of distance units for Sims to detect sex in and consider joining it.\n(Default: 16.0, Minimum: 1.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random club sex occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 1.0, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random solo sex occurring from watching sex. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.10, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random sex from romantic conversations occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.10, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a number of attempts for autonomy picking a Sims Sex Pair and Sex Location Style. Higher values decrease the failure rate.\n(Default: 5, Minimum: 1, Maximum: 120)
Set a number of Sims Sex Pairs that will be considered for autonomy. Lower values mean more precision in picking ideal sex pairs.\n(Default: 8, Minimum: 1)
Set a number of Sex Locations that will be considered for autonomy. Lower values mean more precision in picking ideal locations.\n(Default: 8, Minimum: 1)
Set a minimum number of actors that every sex interaction can be made out of by autonomy joining.\n\n(Default: 3, Minimum: 2)
Set a number of extra points NPC Sims Pairs gain when creating sex pairs. Sims need average of 15 points to create a Sex Pair.\n(Default: 10)
Player to NPC Sims Relationship Modifier
Set a number of extra points Player+NPC Sims Pairs gain when creating sex pairs. Sims need average of 15 points to create a Sex Pair.\n(Default: 0)
Choose and Set allowed for autonomy location styles.
Check to allow picking of sex locations outside of the lot boundaries.
Check to allow picking of sex locations outdoors within lot boundaries
Check to allow picking of risky sex locations.
Check to allow picking of comfortable sex locations.
Check to allow picking of private sex locations.
Set a multiplier value per 'Sim In Room' that increases the likeliness of the room being considered as risky.\n(Default: 2.0, Minimum: 0.0)

Set a number of extra relationship points to add to the average of an NPC Household's relationship value when considering sex while an active Sim is visiting a residential lot.\n(Default: 0, Minimum: 0)
Set cooldown timers for autonomy sex.
Set a number of minimum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy sex again.\n(Default: 90, Minimum: 0)
Set a number of maximum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy sex again.\n(Default: 1800, Minimum: 1)
Set a number of minimum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy club sex again.\n(Default: 45, Minimum: 0)
Set a number of maximum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy club sex again.\n(Default: 90, Minimum: 1)
Choose which asking sex dialogs are displayed.
Display Player Asking Player Sex Dialog
Check for Player Sims asking Player Sims for sex dialogs.
Display NPC Asking Player Sex Dialog
Check for NPC Sims asking Player Sims for sex dialogs.
Display Player Asking NPC Sex Dialog
Check for Player Sims asking NPC Sims for sex dialogs.
Set NPC Sims sex interaction duration in realtime minutes.\n(Default: 3)
Choose a type of how sex positions will progress.
Sex positions will not change on its own.
Sex positions will only change within its stages list.
Sex positions will change within its stages list and then to the next category.
Sex positions will always change to the next category.
Sex interaction duration in realtime minutes.\n(Default: 3)
Sex interaction ends only after a climax position.
Enable/Disable sex position progression when climax animation is playing.
Choose a type of how Sims will undress during sex.
Choose a type of how NPC Sims will undress during sex.
Sims in sex will not undress automatically.
Sims in sex will undress automatically.
Sims in sex will completely undress.
Sims will always dress up after sex.
Strapon will be automatically undressed when not needed in the current animation.
Choose a type of how Sims gender is recognized.
Based on biological characteristics of a Sim genitalia.
Based on current characteristics of a Sim genitalia.\n(Current characteristics are based on the CAS Gender Settings)
Gender is not checked at all.
Allow/Disallow female actors roles as both female and male roles (M/M).
Allow/Disallow male actors roles as both male and female roles (F/F).
Allow/Disallow deciding about individual Sim gender role.
Check to disable restrictions for animations that require specific occult to be available.\n(Sims require an occult, like vampire, alien or ghost, to use animations with occult restrictions)
Sims will not get pregnant from sex.
Sims will follow rules of the menstrual cycle for the pregnancy.
Sims will get pregnant based on the set percentage chance.
Pregnancy duration in Sim days.\n(Default: 3, Minimum: 1)
Choose pregnancy percentage chance for sex interactions involving player Sims.
Choose pregnancy percentage chance for NPC Sims sex interactions.
Choose Sims menstrual cycle fertility level.
Boosted from realistic menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-10%, 20%-31%, 43%-78%)
Extremely high menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-10%, 50%-80%, 90%-100%, 100%)
Uses Sim lifespan set in game settings.
Life expectancy: Forever (21-30 days per menstrual cycle)
Life expectancy: 324 days (18-24 days per menstrual cycle)
Life expectancy: 81 days (8-10 days per menstrual cycle)
Life expectancy: 42 days (6-7 days per menstrual cycle)
Tampons and pads will perfectly prevent any blood leaking.
Tampons and pads will be slightly better at preventing blood leaking.
Tampons and pads have normal blood leak preventing properties.
Makes Sims use tampons automatically when needed.
Sims will not use tampons automatically.
Sims will use and change tampons right before it becomes overused (every 15 hours).
Sims will use and change tampons right when there is any risk of them leaking (every 8 hours).
Makes Sims use pads automatically when needed.
Sims will not use pads automatically.
Sims will use and change pads right before it becomes overused (every 16 hours).
Sims will use and change pads right when there is any risk of them leaking (every 6 hours).
Enable/Disable if NPC Sims can get pregnant on their own.
Every birth control method will prevent pregnancy with 100% success rate.
Every birth control method has a realistic chance of failing to prevent pregnancy.
Change NPC Sims use of birth control behavior.
Most NPC Sims will own and use birth control.
Some NPC Sims will own and use birth control.
NPC Sims will rarely own and use birth control.
NPC Sims will not own birth control unless given.

Makes Sims use birth control automatically when needed.

Condoms are used during any sex that can cause pregnancy.
Birth Control Pills is used once a day.
Enable/Disable if Sims can experience miscarriage.
Change all of the unrelated settings.
Enable/Disable if teens can use sex interactions.
Choose a type of how sex will be initiated.
Sex will start with Sims talking and then walking to the sex location.
Sex will start instantly, teleporting Sims to the sex location.
Override of sex animations duration in realtime seconds.
Use animations duration time defined by the author.
Override duration for all sex animations in realtime seconds.\n\nAnimations will not play exactly for the set amount out time. They will play for the approximate number of loops for the set time.
Enable/Disable visibility of cum layers when using a condom.
Enable/Disable auto silencing of Sim phone during sex.
Check to reserve objects used for sex. Reservation prevents Sims from using the objects while they are being used for sex.
Enable/Disable if non-sex (vanilla) interactions are available during sex.
Enable/Disable default Woohoo and Try for Baby interactions.\n\n(Requires to restart the game.)
Change things that you find annoying.
Enable/Disable if Sims will always accept sex propositions.
Enable/Disable global instant undressing outside sex.
Enable/Disable control over NPC Sims sex.
Check to allow Sims to change sex location without limits.
Enable/Disable if Sim needs will decay during sex.
Enable/Disable if Sims will avoid sex locations.
Enable/Disable if Sims will react to sex.
Enable/Disable if Sims will react to cum on other Sims.
Enable/Disable if parent Sims will react to teen Sims pregnancy.
Enable/Disable specific animations from being used.
Enable/Disable specific animations from being used in autonomy sex.
Select which creator animations you want to disable.
Enable/Disable all animations on this list.

2. Type in 'ww.stop_sex' command.

Sexually Alluring Sims are really successful at convincing other to have sex with them.
Sexually Abstinent Sims have no interest in sexual activities.
The extreme vibe of sexual desire makes this an especially great place to have sex.
Thanks for ordering! The sex items {0.SimFirstName} purchased will be delivered to {M0.his}{F0.her} mailbox.
These Sims desire to see their partner have sex with someone else and don't consider it cheating.
{0.SimFirstName} just needs a few more minutes to get some relief. What {M0.he}{F0.she} didn't want was another Sim barging in and interrupting while they were trying to finish off!

Uh Oh! {0.SimFirstName} has caught {1.SimFirstName} in the middle of masturbating. This awkward situation could have easily been avoided if one Sim had been that extra bit more careful to not get caught. Unfortunately for {0.SimFirstName}, {1.SimFirstName} could not keep control and the dam had to blow letting loose a deluge of satisfaction for {M0.his}{F0.her} eyes to see!

Uh Oh! {0.SimFirstName} has caught {1.SimFirstName} in the middle of masturbating. This awkward situation could have easily been avoided if one Sim had been that extra bit more careful to not get caught. Unfortunately for {1.SimFirstName}, the sudden appearance of another Sim meant that {M1.he}{F1.she} needed to keep it in {M1.his}{F1.her} pants. {0.SimFirstName} saw something they really didn't need or want to see and {1.SimFirstName} has been left embarrassed and unsatisfied.
Strangers always provide a wildcard to sex, but the touch of Sims unknown has left {0.SimFirstName} satisfied from {M0.his}{F0.her} moment of passion.
Wow, that was really something. Youth these days sure have a lot of energy and {0.SimFirstName} just loved watching that hot body move.
{0.SimFirstName}'s mind is running at superspeed with the idea that they could have been caught whilst in the middle of their dirty deed.
How Exciting! With all eyes on {0.SimFirstName} while they were having sex, {M0.he}{F0.she} couldn't help but feel even more aroused knowing that others were enjoying their show.
That was wonderful, there's nothing quite like the familiar touch of a lover's embrace. {0.SimFirstName} is truly glad to have shared a passionate moment with {M0.his}{F0.her} spouse.
After what can be described as a strange otherworldly encounter, {0.SimFirstName} can't help but feel full of life whilst being so close to death.
Amazing! Sex with several partners was just the sort of fun activity that {0.SimFirstName} needed.
That was pretty good. {0.SimFirstName} enjoyed their sexual encounter and was able to finish it off satisfied.
Seriously? {0.SimFirstName} thought that the sex would be magical but they were left unsatisfied. Did {M0.he}{F0.she} expect too much?
What even was that!? {0.SimFirstName} wants other Sims to really moan during sex but that was just anticlimactic... Was it because they weren't good enough?
Well that was... something. {0.SimFirstName} was left unsatisfied and uncomfortable from the sex they just had.
First time sex with a new Sim is always a memorable experience!
There's nothing like the thrill of sex outside. That was fun!
{0.SimFirstName} is really turned on by seeing {M0.his}{F0.her} partner have sex with someone else.

They're doing WHAT? {0.SimFirstName} is completely at a loss for words after catching {M0.his}{F0.her} child in the middle of having sex with their relative! {M0.He}{F0.She} has no idea how this started but this needs to END NOW!
How Scandalous! Those Sims were in the middle of an incestuous encounter! {0.SimFirstName} just saw something {M0.he}{F0.she} really shouldn't have.
{0.SimFirstName} got curious and now {M0.he}{F0.she} has no idea what they've stumbled across. From all that grunting, moaning and sweat it can't be good.
What do these kids think they're doing? {0.SimFirstName} just saw {M0.his}{F0.her} child in the middle of a dirty deed with another Sim! If they aren't using protection there'll be hell to pay!
Any Parent would be outraged to see their child going at it with a Sim who is much older than they are. This is disgusting, that Sim is too old and {0.SimFirstName}'s child is too young!
That was awkward! No parent expects to walk into a room and see their child masturbating. {0.SimFirstName} better make sure to knock next time before they enter the room!
That'll teach {0.SimFirstName} the importance of knocking! Their child isn't a little kid anymore, perhaps they do need their privacy.

Gross! No {M0.son}{F0.daughter} wants to see their parents getting it on. {0.SimFirstName} is going to be mentally scarred from this experience. {M0.He}{F0.She} did not enjoy this unpleasant lesson on their conception.
Wait... This is {0.SimFirstName}'s house. This isn't their house! {0.SimFirstName} is sure everyone's well aware of the phrase 'My Home Is Your Home', but this is going WAY TOO FAR!

{0.SimFirstName} is neck deep in stress right now and the last thing they want is to see other Sims enjoying themselves. That's unfair! {M0.He}{F0.She} wishes {M0.he}{F0.she} could be as carefree as those Sims right now!
{0.SimFirstName} utterly hates that Sim. The sight of them getting off has left a bad taste in {M0.his}{F0.her} mouth. Better move along before {M0.he}{F0.she} decides to do something stupid.

What is this feeling? {0.SimFirstName} cannot comprehend this deep sense of longing and melancholy after watching love that once was but can never be again. So this is what it's like to have a heart shatter.
That was just what {0.SimFirstName} needed. A rather exciting scene to relieve the stress {M0.he's}{F0.she's} been feeling. Perhaps now {M0.he}{F0.she} wont be so on edge.
Good for them! {0.SimFirstName} fondly remembers a pleasant encounter with that Sim and now seeing them enjoy themselves so vigorously makes {M0.him}{F0.her} just want to cheer them on.
If there's one thing that excites {0.SimFirstName} more than anything else, it's the sight of the one {M0.he}{F0.she} loves - naked, sweating and moaning.
{0.SimFirstName} had no expectations that today {M0.he}{F0.she} would find a Sim going at it right in front of {M0.his}{F0.her} eyes. You don't see that every day!

Performing a pregnancy test or waiting a day will show the result.

Attempting conception sex multiple times a day with the same partner will not yield different results.
Amidst all the doubtfulness, sadness and confusion, there is anger. Can {0.SimFirstName} cope with having {M0.his}{F0.her} teen child pregnant?

Consequences of not taking care of yourself...

From what {0.SimFirstName} can understand, it seems like {1.SimFirstName} is on {M1.his}{F1.her} period right now.
From what {0.SimFirstName} can understand, it seems like {1.SimFirstName} just finished {M1.his}{F1.her} period. That means {M1.he}{F1.she} will be ovulating really soon.

Box of 24 strong and thin latex condoms for any size. Exactly what you need to avoid unwanted pregnancy.\n\nUnpack the box and get 24 usable condoms.
Exactly what you need to avoid unwanted pregnancy. Keep them around, you never know when you would need one.\n\nUse it during sex by clicking on it in Sim inventory, don't wait, it can get too late!
Box of 28 birth control pills. Use one every day and don't worry about unwanted pregnancy.\n\nUnpack the box and get 28 usable pills.
Helps with periods and unwanted pregnancy. Remember to take one once a day!\n\nUse it once a day by clicking on it in Sim inventory. With each missed day, you risk becoming pregnant.
Oh no! Does that Sim have an itchy nose or can they smell {0.SimFirstName}’s pad? The currently drenched in blood pad is causing a nervous feeling in {M0.him}{F0.her} gut.
Oof! What could possibly be that putrid smell? {0.SimFirstName} can’t escape that fishy smell in the air. Could it possibly be coming from that Sim?

Oh Dear, blood seems to really be accumulating down in {0.SimFirstName}’s loins, staining {M0.his}{F0.her} clothes. {M0.He}{F0.She} should quickly apply either a tampon or pad. If {0.SimFirstName} doesn’t already have one present perhaps they could ask for help.

Oh no, what a mess! {0.SimFirstName} didn’t use a pad or tampon when {M0.he}{F0.she} needed to and now the blood has stained {M0.his}{F0.her} clothes. This is a dreadful predicament, hopefully someone nearby can help if {0.SimFirstName} doesn’t already have something on hand.

THE BLOOD! IT’S EVERYWHERE! {0.SimFirstName}’s clothes look like those of a victim in a horror movie and {M0.he}{F0.she} desperately needs either a pad or tampon ASAP before the situation gets any worse. Quickly! If there isn’t any protection on hand maybe another Sim can help.

There’s a light trickling sensation running down {0.SimFirstName}’s leg. It appears that {M0.his}{F0.her} pad has done it’s duty but in the end could only absorb so much. {0.SimFirstName} should deal with this by applying a replacement immediately, it’d be unhygienic to leave it in such a state.

The pad did it’s job but it could only absorb so much! Further bleeding has now ruined {0.SimFirstName}’s clothing. The blood has rushed down {M0.his}{F0.her} legs leaving noticeable stains across the material. This is a sorry state to be in, {0.SimFirstName} should make use of a replacement.

The pad tried as hard as it could but in the face of such a heavy flow it stood no chance. Blood has seeped through the cotton and down {0.SimFirstName}’s legs, ruining {M0.his}{F0.her} clothing the longer it lingers there. There’s definitely no further use out of this tampon, a replacement must be found ASAP!

There’s a light trickling sensation running down {0.SimFirstName}’s leg. It appears that {M0.his}{F0.her} tampon has done it’s duty but in the end could only absorb so much. {0.SimFirstName} should deal with this by applying a replacement immediately, it’d be unhygienic to leave it in such a state.

The tampon did it’s job but it could only absorb so much! Further bleeding has now ruined {0.SimFirstName}’s clothing. The blood has rushed down {M0.his}{F0.her} legs leaving noticeable stains across the material. This is a sorry state to be in, {0.SimFirstName} should make use of a replacement.

The tampon tried as hard as it could but in the face of such a heavy flow it stood no chance. Blood has seeped through the cotton and down {0.SimFirstName}’s legs, ruining {M0.his}{F0.her} clothing the longer it lingers there. There’s definitely no further use out of this tampon, a replacement must be found ASAP!

The period has been blocked. Through {M0.his}{F0.her} recent actions, {0.SimFirstName} has missed this part of {M0.his}{F0.her} menstrual cycle. For now, {0.SimFirstName} won't need to worry about pads or tampons.

{0.SimFirstName} can’t shake the queasy feeling going through {M0.his}{F0.her} mind and through {M0.his}{F0.her} gut. It’s like being on a small boat in the midst of rocky waters. {0.SimFirstName} doesn’t have the energy to do anything and no appetite at all.

Right now is not a good time for any Sim to be messing with {0.SimFirstName}. The stress that {M0.his}{F0.her} menstrual cycle can cause just makes the world itself so much more annoying. Any meddling Sim better watch out because {M0.he’s}{F0.she’s} seeing red!

Something doesn’t feel quite right. It may be a side effect from {M0.his}{F0.her} monthly cycle but {0.SimFirstName} can’t shake this dizzying feeling that the world around {M0.him}{F0.her} is spinning uncontrollably.

No one seems to understand or care about what {0.SimFirstName} is going through right now. At the moment, {M0.he}{F0.she} can’t seem to keep {M0.his}{F0.her} emotions in check. The effects of having a monthly cycle has left {M0.him}{F0.her} in a complete wreck.

{0.SimFirstName} is getting a painful sensation emanating from {M0.his}{F0.her} body that {M0.he}{F0.she} just can't ignore. This aching feeling that comes during one's cycle is never an enjoyable experience but this time it’s especially difficult. Hopefully this distress will subside.

{0.SimFirstName} is all nerves right now and can’t seem to focus. {M0.He’s}{F0.She’s} having difficulty keeping still and is stressing {M0.himself}{F0.herself} over minor things. Having a uterus is no fun when you have to go through this.

{0.SimFirstName}’s really in the mood for some action. {M0.He}{F0.She} seems to have a sudden urge to get down and dirty. Maybe it’s the blood pumping but {M0.he’s}{F0.she’s} feeling especially titillated right now.
Sims with Extra Absorbency won't have to change tampons and pads so often.

{0.SimFirstName} will soon have {M0.his}{F0.her} period. It's best to prepare and purchase Tampons and Pads to protect {M0.him}{F0.her} from leaking menstrual blood.
Or start using Birth Control Pills to prevent the natural Menstrual Cycle.

Tampons, Pads, and Birth Control can be ordered from a computer.

Box of 7 tampons and 7 pads. A mix of both will guarantee the best protection from heavy menstrual bleeding.\n\nUnpack the box and get 7 wrapped tampons and 7 wrapped pads.

Box of 14 tampons. A sleek and sophisticated feminine hygiene product to help keep your period private.\n\nUnpack the box and get 14 wrapped tampons.
Comfortable organic cotton Kaya Tampons security veil around the absorbent core that prevents fiber shedding and makes for softer extract.\n\nUnwrap it to get a tampon with an applicator.
Made with 100% certified organic cotton, Kaya Pads use no chemicals, synthetics, or dyes. Great absorbency for day and night usage.\n\nUnwrap it to get a menstrual pad.

Comfortable organic cotton Kaya Tampons security veil around the absorbent core that prevents fiber shedding and makes for softer extract.\n\nUse it at least once a day by clicking on it in Sim inventory. Replacing it more often decreases the chance of potential issues.

Made with 100% certified organic cotton, Kaya Pads use no chemicals, synthetics, or dyes. Great absorbency for day and night usage.\n\nUse it at least once a day by clicking on it in Sim inventory. Replacing it more often decreases the chance of potential issues.

Spray the smut away and balance the pH of your skin with the hydrating and refreshing rosewater mist. Avoid spraying it in mouth or eyes!

<font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims from attempting to have sex on the lot. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims from attempting to have sex on the lot. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect. It will disappear when in Live Mode.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room.
<font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from attempting to have sex. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from attempting to have sex. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room. It will disappear when in Live Mode.

The <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room.

The <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room. It will disappear when in Live Mode.
